channel.title: Compile
channel.description:
hey everybody, i have java 1.5.0_10, and i think i did the enviromentals correct, but when i open compile it says
"The system cannot find the path specified. press any key to continue . . ."
Instead of:
"Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . ."
if some 1 can post the variables so i can verify that they are correct, and if there is another reason why this wont work, post please ASAP

item.title: Compile
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

eclipse245:

there is the problem…u need java JDK 6

No thats not the problem.You need to edit your classpath since you updated your JDK.Or you can simple put this in your compile.

@echo off title Compiler javac *.java pause

Read full topic

@eclipse245 wrote:

there is the problem…u need java JDK 6
